content: Love this app. This app is very helpful and easy to use for younger girl, It tracks your cycle each month, along with any symptoms you experience each day. you can add note each day along with tracking weight and temperature during your cycle. The app reminds you days before you cycle start so you can be prepared. I have been using this for 8 years my daughter use it and so does my sister's and my nieces. I recommend this app to everyone.

The app is very good, accurate, it helps me thoughtout my cycle to be self aware and manage pms. I have been using it for 4 years now, back then I had given an alternative mail id which isn't working now and there is no option to change the mail id given... So if I happen to log out, all the tracking data for all these years would go. Kindly make it easier to change the mail given as I don't even remember my password and the reset authentication mail will come up on the mail id I can't access.

문제가 생겼던 점은 제게 이메일로 연락 해주시고 잘 픽스해주셨어요. 생리때라 더 민감하게 나쁘게 글을 썼는데 지금보니 너무 후회스럽네요 ㅜㅠ 좋은 서비스 정말 감사합니다. 여러분 문제 생기더라도 잘 고쳐주시니 걱정마시고 이메일로 연락해보세요! 별점 5개가 아니라 100개 드리고싶내요. Maya넘 사랑해요(*ㅇㅅㅇ*)❥❥ 업데이트 있길래 업데이트 했더니 다 날아감ㅋㅋㅋ 2013년부터 주기 있던거 이걸로 갈아타면서 이 어플에 다 저장해놓고 이것저것 다 입력 되어있는데 날아갔어요ㅋㅋㅋ 안 그래도 생리 시작해서 기분 최악인데 막막 짜증나서 미칠것같네요. 비번 기억 안나시는분들 업데이트 하지마세요. 업뎃하면 다시 로그인 해야 하는데 비번이 기억안나서 이메일로 비번 보내기? 해서 받은걸로 로그인해도 로그인 되는 척하다가 다시 로그인창으로 돌아감 환장!!! +) 그래서 다른 어플로 갈아타려고 여러개 다운 받아 봤는데 이게 젤 남.. 그리고 손에 익음 이거로 다시 시작함 ㅜㅠㅜㅠㅜㅠ 엉엉엉 +) 개발자님 사람몸이 그지같아서 생리 시작하고 생리끝만 달력에 입력되는게 아니라 '생리중'도 입력 할수있었으면 좋겠어요. 원래 5일정도 생리하는 사람도 스트레스 받고 그러면 갑자기 더 할수도 있고 그렇잖어요. 생리기간 늘리고 싶은데 아짓 하는중이라 '생리끝'이 아니라 생리중인걸로 달력에 입력하고 싶어요.

Incredibly useful, this app has definitely had a positive impact on my life. I'd credit it with fewer "emergencies" as I know almost exactly when my period will arrive - after years of use the app predicts my cycle to the day more often than not. The other benefits include understanding my mood and physical fluctuations better (ie explaining why I might be feeling sensitive or ravenous) understanding what biological processes are at work, practising extra safe sex, and predicting when my depression might play up - something which you'll know is really invaluable if you're a (menstruating) woman with mental health issues. My favourite part is actually the neat graph feature, which lets you see how long previous cycles have been and compare changes or see patterns. The only reason I can't give 5 stars is because I find the interface aesthetically displeasing, but then again who cares, it's so incredibly useful that it doesn't matter all that much to me.
